content: TE-S FS Floor scrapers Extra-sharp TE-S floor scraper chisels for removing flooring and coatings using demolition tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Specially designed, high-performance floor scraper chisel – sharpened, flexible blade cuts under material faster and the beveled plate edge better prevents material from binding up Upgraded breaking power – extra-tough connection end transfers more force from the tool to the chisel Better reliability – these chisel bits are made from high-alloy steel, essential when you need consistency and reliability Certified quality – developed using ISO certified processes and more than 30 years of expertise in chisel design and production Built for tough jobs – tested for extreme use, our floor scrapers are made to power through your most demanding surface removal work Applications Removing flooring or coating such as linoleum, vinyl tile (PVC), laminate or adhesives For use with TE-S electric jackhammers, breakers or rotary hammers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-S Width: 6 in Product Class: Premium Technical Data | Connection end | TE-S | Width | 6 in | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2312356 - Floor scraper TE-SX FS - Package Size 1 pc - 2429755 - Floor scraper TE-S FS - Package Size 1 pc
